item.description:
For December's brunch we'll go to The Chateau in Norton

http://www.chateaurestaurant.com/norton/norton.asp

This is a buffet brunch for $16.00 per person

The brunch menu is not on their website yet.  The Chateau takes a "brunch break" for the summer and has just started serving it again this week.  When they post their menu, I'll update you.

Basically, it's all the usual brunch items you would expect at a buffet plus...

As usual, everyone is responsible to pay for their own alcoholic beverages at brunch.  All food and non-alcoholic beverages will be combined onto one bill, tax and tip will be added, and the bill will be divided evenly by the number of attendees. 

Hope to see  you there !
item.name: December Brunch - The Chateau in Norton
